main event: On April 7, 1967, a resident in Old Bridge, New Jersey reported observing a bright, oval-shaped object that emitted pulsating light and hovered in the sky.
interesting points: The object appeared to be approximately 50 feet in diameter.,The witness estimated the object was about 500 yards away.,The object changed colors from white to orange during its observation.,The object was seen for approximately five minutes before it rapidly accelerated and disappeared.,The investigation found no physical evidence to confirm the object, hence it was classified as 'Unidentified'.
witness description: The witnesses were a resident and his wife who reported seeing the object from their back porch.
